headline: RapidSpike review
description: RapidSpike can run synthetic website monitoring tests as well as checks for SEO, security, accessibility and performance. Read our review of RapidSpike - a website monitoring tool.

offers.description: 500 data usage credits with a account manager

negativeNotes: Uses a credit system for billing which is difficult to understand
positiveNotes: Uses Selenium to simulate browser interactions

author.name: Naman Singhal
author.description: Naman has a background in computer science and has published research with IEEE on predicting software bugs using machine learning models.

name: Website monitoring tool
reviewBody: RapidSpike takes a different approach from the other website monitoring tools we reviewed with a focus more on the overall website experience, including checks for SEO, security, accessibility and performance. It supports the usual check types like HTTP and various protocols, as well as synthetic monitoring using Selenium.
